Itthā Sutta：1．Itthā Sutta．-Preached to Anāthapindika on five things in the world which are very desirable but are difficult to attain - longevity，beauty，happiness，fame，happy rebirth - and on the means of obtaining them （A．iii．47-9）．



2．Itthā Sutta．-The ten desirable things in the world，the obstacles to their attainment and the methods of procuring them （A．v．135f）．
